title: MacBook Pro 13" 2017 NON Touch Bar Model SSD Issues
message: MacBook Pro 13" 2017 non touch bar model, the Mac works fine most of the time, but sometimes it will not recognize the boot drive as if there was none installed, after several restarts it will eventually recognize it and work fine again. This model can have the SSD replaced just in case, but this one has the original one.

title: MacBook Pro 13" 2017 NON Touch Bar Model SSD Issues
message: Try another SSD as the SSD's in the 2016/17 randomly fail

title: MacBook Pro 13" 2017 NON Touch Bar Model SSD Issues
message: Try known good compatible SSD for that model.
